g.text: Open the Wallet Instance app, local authentication
Extract the parameters from the QR Code
provides Wallet metadata to the request_uri endpoint
[if request_uri_method is set with GET or not present]
requests the signed request object from the request_uri endpoint
evaluates Relying Party Metadata and policies
Verify signature of the signed Request Object
and the Wallet Instance is not revoked.
Check Holder Key Binding and Proof of Possession:
- using the public key bound in the Credential to verify the VP token.
Then Extract the disclosed attributes: check if all the required data are available
QRCode JS: Check authentication state (HTTP request with cookie)
Authentication state given with HTTP codes, untill expired or successful
